events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but the left ear cup is making a crackling noise and feels loose.
The issue has been identified as a possible product defect due to malfunctioning parts and physical looseness.
The support request has been assigned to agent Maria G. for further assistance regarding the defective headphones.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your headphones. I'm here to help resolve the crackling noise issue.
Could you please confirm if you have tried adjusting the ear cup or if the crackling happens only during certain movements?
Yes, I tried repositioning it, but the noise persists, and the ear cup still feels loose when I move my head.
We'd like to offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I appreciate the quick response. I would prefer a replacement unit since I like this model a lot.
Your replacement headphones will be shipped within 2 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
We hope your replacement headphones arrived and are working perfectly. Please contact us if any further issues arise.
We are closing this case as resolved. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding throughout the process.
